item.description: hi, i’m sunil! i’m the founder & ceo of saddle, an open source developer of decentralized exchange protocols on ethereum. i previously worked on infrastructure security, self-driving cars, and real-time analytics at uber. i â™¥ startups and cool technology (most recently cryptocurrencies and decentralized finance). i double majored in computer science / finance at washington university in st. louis. specialties: i can teleport when no one is looking.
